name: Admin Console Release 25.7.0
description: This release of the Admin Console brings you new features and improvements. See below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

ADDED.text: Now, users can configure Custom Domain for IDX in the Admin Console.
You can enable or disable Case Sensitive Username, Social login via ping API, OTP Email Verification, IP Access Restriction, Step-up Authentication, etc. feature in the Admin Console.

IMPROVED.text: UI has been updated with a slider element for showing enabled/disbabled features, Advance workflow, Social Login, Custom Domain, Email Workflow, IP Access Restriction, Multi-Factor Authentication, and JS Widgets Setting in the Admin Console, etc.
Related Documents links have been added for all the respective sections of the Admin Console.
Reset button is added under Search and Blocked customer in the Customer Management in Admin Console.
